## PendingReceipt type

Indicates that the transaction hasn't been mined yet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PendingReceipt = {
    status: 'pending';
};
```

## Remarks

Returned by [SentRmmTransaction.getReceipt()](./rmm-ethers.sentrmmtransaction.getreceipt.md)<!-- -->.
